title: Shotton Colliery Christmas tree cut down after lights switch-on
description: The tree, which has stood for 10 years, is cut down a few hours after it was officially lit up.
content:
Christmas tree chopped down after lights switch on
Published
6 hours ago
A Christmas tree that has stood in a village for more than 10 years has been cut down.
The tree in Shotton Colliery, County Durham, was believed to have been deliberately felled... [703 chars]

title: Fifa urged to halt World Cup ticket sales after ‘monumental betrayal’ of fans
description: Fifa has been urged to halt World Cup ticket sales after it emerged countries’ most loyal fans would have to pay £3,000 for a ticket to the final
content:
Fifa has been accused of a “monumental betrayal” by fan representatives after it emerged that the cheapest tickets for next summer’s World Cup final will cost more than £3,000.

title: US wants Ukraine to withdraw from Donbas and create ‘free economic zone’, says Zelenskyy
description: Ukrainian president says plan would not be fair without guarantees that Russia would not simply take over zone
content:
TheUS wants Ukraine to withdraw its troops from the Donbas region, and Washington would then create a “free economic zone” in the parts Kyiv currently controls, Volodymyr Zelenskyy has said.

title: Ethiopia TikTok: Six influencers arrested for 'indecent' dress at awards ceremony
description: Adonay Berhane, Wongelawit Gebre Endrias and four others are accused by police of undermining public morality.
content:
Ethiopian police have arrested a sixth popular TikTok creator days after five other influencers were detained over allegations of wearing "indecent attire" at a public event in the culturally conservative country.

title: Lorry driver held after suspected immigrants found in Oxfordshire
description: Thirteen people were found in the back of a vehicle which was stopped on the M40 near Bicester
content:
A lorry driver has been arrested on suspicion of immigration offences after 13 people were found in the back of a lorry on a motorway.
